notes.title: Competing interests
notes.p: NS receives investigator-initiated research funding from Gilead Sciences unrelated to this work. AT is an advisory board member for Gilead Sciences, AbbVie, BMS, Merck, and Roche Diagnostics and a speaker for Gilead, Merck, BMS, AbbVie, and Roche Diagnostics. EB is developing vaccines as part of an Fp7 EU consortium (PEACHI) that includes GSK as a partner and has received funding to her institution from GSK to deliver studies in hepatitis C vaccines that encode class II invariant chain. MH and the Burnet Institute receive investigator-initiated research funding from Gilead Sciences, AbbVie, and BMS.
